message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to let it go for $60.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I can only pay up to $55.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $65.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to pay $60 for the product, which is closer to your initial offer.
Hi Bob, I understand you're close to my initial offer. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I can offer it to you for $67.50, which is still a great deal considering the value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to pay $65 for the product, which I believe is fair given its value.
